title: Short-maturity asymptotics for option prices with interest rates effects
abstract: arXiv:2402.14161v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: We derive the short-maturity asymptotics for option prices in the local volatility model in a new short-maturity limit $T\to 0$ at fixed $\rho = (r-q) T$, where $r$ is the interest rate and $q$ is the dividend yield. In cases of practical relevance $\rho$ is small, however our result holds for any fixed $\rho$. The result is a generalization of the Berestycki-Busca-Florent formula for the short-maturity asymptotics of the implied volatility which includes interest rates and dividend yield effects of $O(((r-q) T)^n)$ to all orders in $n$. We obtain analytical results for the ATM volatility and skew in this asymptotic limit. Explicit results are derived for the CEV model. The asymptotic result is tested numerically against exact evaluation in the square-root model model $\sigma(S)=\sigma/\sqrt{S}$, which demonstrates that the new asymptotic result is in very good agreement with exact evaluation in a wide range of model parameters relevant

translated_title: 具有利率效应的期权价格短期渐近分析
translated_abstract: 我们推导了在局部波动率模型中，期权价格在新的短期极限$T\to 0$下的短期渐近行为，其中固定$\rho = (r-q)T$，其中$r$为利率，$q$为股利收益率。在实际情况中，$\rho$很小，但我们的结果对于任何固定的$\rho$都成立。结果是Berestycki-Busca-Florent公式的推广，用于隐含波动率的短期渐近行为，包括利率和股利收益效应的$O(((r-q)T)^n)$至$n$阶。我们在这个渐近极限下得到了ATM波动率和偏斜的解析结果。对CEV模型得到了显式结果。利用平方根模型$\sigma(S)=\sigma/\sqrt{S}$，我们对渐近结果进行了数值测试，结果表明新的渐近结果在广泛的模型参数范围内与精确计算非常吻合。
tldr: 该论文推导了具有利率效应的局部波动率模型中期权价格在短期极限情况下的渐近行为，得到了ATM波动率和偏斜的解析结果，并对CEV模型进行了数值测试。
en_tdlr: The paper derives the short-maturity asymptotics for option prices with interest rates effects in the local volatility model, obtaining analytical results for ATM volatility and skew, and conducting numerical tests for the CEV model.
